language.entry: Enigma wears aetheric robes and carries a mysterious orb of arcane power, ever since a curse turned his skin to stone his power has grown exponentially. He empowers his abilities and his allies, the longer the fight lasts the stronger the group becomes.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.

Riddles and puzzles are not the only things the Enigma excels at. Using his power, he can increase the group's offensive or defensive capability. His abilities are very versatile, he can empower them in different ways.

Enigma is a patient individual. He stays awake as others rest, he gives his group riddles and puzzles to occupy their minds and relieve their stress. His most iconic thing is creating framents that everyone can use to empower themselves or trinkets that empower him immensely.
I will do what i must.
Create a fragment of power or a trinket for this class.
This should help close your wounds.
Here, I don't need these, I hardly ever bleed.
I don't need these, here you go.
As long as I'm here you will have unimaginable power.
You shouldn't be afraid as long as I'm here.
I'm pretty sure this will all end well.
There is no room for failure! I will protect us!
Look at us, we are unstoppable!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
That is something i'm not interested in.
I think i need to meditate instead.
I should have stayed at the Hamlet!
I despise this feeling of fear.
I feel the presence of our enemies.
More of them will be here soon.
We have to hurry, more are coming.
You can do better than that!
Coming here with you was a mistake.
We are not going to survive this.
I will forever be in your debt.
I will take you all on!
Need to move back, the tension is overwhelming.
They are coming, I have to move.
I will give you some time to recover.
I will buy you some time.
Standing here doesn't do us any good.
No, I wont just stand here.
Why does this fear last so long?
If I do that, they will kill me.
They want me to do that!
I am not sure if now is the time.
That cannot be done at the moment.
I don't care about any of this.
There is no need for that.
I am exhausted, i need a moment.
Arcane arts are not easy, give me some time.
I'm pretty sure this is a better idea.
I know what has to be done!
I have waited a long time for this.
I will win this battle for us.
Arcane arts are hard to execute.
I know what spell must be used.
This is better for the current situation.
I am not sure what to do.
I have to do something to stop this fear.
Be very careful, they are near.
We need to hurry this up, i thirsty for a fight.
I'm itching to cast more spells.
You all need to become more resilient.
Coming with you was a bad idea.
I shouldn't be here with all of you.
Without my sorcery, you would perish.
I think i should have lead my own expedition.
I am the reason why we still stand.
I wish we got another curse.
I think it's time to return to the Hamlet.
I don't care what you have to say.
Watch what you say in front of a mystic!
I'm over here, come and get me!
Let's see if you can hurt me!
My arcane arts will end you!
I'm so tired, cannot go further.
What is the meaning of this?
Why leave? They are waiting for us!
More are waiting outside, we shouldn't retreat.
This needs to be our end!
This is where our path ends.
No, we need to stay and fight!
We are no cowards, fight on!
They knew what i was going to do?!
That cannot happen and somehow it did...
Get out of my way, i need some room.
This will almost certainly end badly...
There is no hope for us.
This is what you wanted, isn't it?
I knew that was going to happen...
How do you let that happen?
It's not smart to stay and fight, if we know the risk is high.
I know that they are up to something.
We are failing because of you!
I refuse to believe that just happened.
This is a very suspicious situation.
Can someone remind me why we are making the same mistakes twice.
We should move the other way.
We are about to be attacked.
You have no idea where we are going, don't you?
Why are we going this way again?
I am so tired of this journey.
No, i am not using that.
That is exactly what they want.
That will not make a difference.
Rather not, the outcome will still be the same.
I don't need help to survive.
That is not a good idea.
I do not need special care.
Healing me will not change anything.
Healing me won't help us at all.
I do not like that plan.
I will heal, when i want to heal.
I don't need empowerment right now!
This isn't the time, they are surrounding us!
My gut tells me i should fight!
That will not change the outcome!
That will not make a difference.
No, I know what I'm doing, leave me be.
No, I will not do that.
You are no match for me!
This is not a good place to rest.
Fear is such a fascinating emotion.
That sound cannot be a good sign.
We need to hurry up, our next battle awaits.
I knew coming here was a bad idea.
Today is a very sad day.
I need some time to recover.
I'm having a hard time focusing.
I feel we should abandon this quest.
I know for a fact they are planning something.
I don't like how you are all looking at me.
I should have stayed in the inn.
Can i have some silence, please.
Like that will make a difference.
I like your enthusiasm, but that doesn't change a thing.
We live because of my esoteric sorcery.
I am always the reason groups survive.
I wish i could taste food.
I don't need that much food.
I would rather pass on food.
We need to get this over with quickly.
Being fed won't help us win battles.
This does not help us one bit.
We are all here for a lost cause.
I don't think i should eat right now.
Alright, i guess i will eat.

L'Enigme porte une robe thrique et un orbe contenant une puissance arcanique. Depuis, ses pouvoirs n'ont cess de crotre, au prix d'une maldiction transformant sa peau en pierre. Sa capacit dcupler les forces de ses allis tout comme les effets de ses sorts permet au groupe de mener de longs combats.
La proximit de deux d'entre nous est dangereuse pour tous.
La proximit de deux d'entre nous est dangereuse pour tous.

Devinettes et puzzles ne sont pas les seuls atouts de l'Enigme. Ses differents pouvoirs sont versatiles : il peut en amliorer les effets ou soutenir les capacits dfensives ou offensives de ses allis avec.

L'Enigme est patiente et ne dort presque jamais. Il fait honneur son nom en donnant des puzzles ou des devinettes au groupe, qui ressortent plus calme de l'exercice. Une chose unique l'Enigme est la cration soit de fragments de pouvoirs que tous peuvent utiliser, soit d'quipement le rendant plus puissant.
Cre un fragment de pouvoir ou une breloque spcifique cette classe.
Cela devrait t'aider panser tes blessures.
Tiens, je n'en n'ai pas besoin, je saigne peine.
C'est pour toi, je ne m'en servirais pas.
En ma prsence, tu auras le pouvoir de continuer.
Tu n'as pas avoir peur ; Je suis l.
Ma protection ne nous fera pas dfaut dans le danger !
Ne doute jamais de mon mysticisme !
Voyez ce qui peut tre cr !
Une puissance infinie, porte de main !
Un morceau de pouvoir, sous vos yeux !
Que votre peau soit de pierre !
Qu'est ce qui meurt en lui donnant de l'eau ? ... Un feu.
Qu'est ce qui se brise si elle n'est pas tenue ? ... Une promesse.
Vers o pouvez-vous aller sans jamais l'atteindre ? ... L'horizon.
Cela n'est pas digne de mon intrt.
Je pense je vais plutt mditer.
Ma maldiction ne te sauvera pas !
Je ressentirais donc la peur ? Intressant...
Votre corps est-il donc si faible que cela ?
Les lieux, les combats... Quelle tristesse...
Non, ce ne sont pas que des illusions ; je le jure !
Ma peau est plus dure que d'habitude aujourd'hui.
Je ne laisserai pas la peur guider mes choix !
Je vois mon ennemi, il ne peut m'chapper !
Nous vaincrons tous ceux qui voudront nous vaincre !
Rien de ce que je subis ne fera vaciller !
Tout comme ma peau, l'esprit peut gurir !
Votre peur n'a pas lieu d'tre. Laissez-la se dissiper !
Ma force est la votre, servez-vous-en !
Ma peau peut se fissurer, mais jamais casser !
Cette peur ne me permet pas d'agir correctement...
Quand cette sensation va t-elle s'arrter ?
Je les sens, ils sont autour de nous.
Je ne veux pas avoir affronter plus de ces monstres.
Ce n'est mme pas une gratinure !
C'est tout ce que vous avez ?!
Etait-ce vraiment l ta meilleure attaque!
Pourquoi suis-je donc venus avec vous...
Laissez faire quelqu'un qui sait faire !
Nul autre que moi peut vous sauver, laissez-moi faire !
Ne comptez pas sur ma puissance pour vous soutenir.
Nous n'aurions jamais du venir ici.
Vous voyez cet orbe, eh bien elle a disparu !
Rien dans les mains, rien dans les poches !
Voici le coup du chapeau ! Ah, c'est vrai, je n'ai pas chapeau...
Je dois reculer, cause de cette peur...
Ils approchent ! Je dois aller vers l'arrire.
Si vous devez rcuprer, je vais l'avant.
Quelle audience ! Attendez le prochain tour !
Partez, je ne survivrais pas, de toute faon.
Je dois en finir avec cette maldiction.
Je ne devrais pas me tenir l....
Quel intrt avons nous dans cette position..
Laissez faire le matre en magie !
Que personne n'y touche, ils m'appartiennent !
Je ne prendrais pas les coups votre place.
Cette peur me laisse de marbre.
Pourquoi la peur dure t-elle si longtemps ?
Toute action pourrait m'tre fatale, ici.
S'ils veulent que je bouge, ils attendront longtemps.
Je refuse de leur rvler mes plans !
Ce n'est pas le moment pour moi, je dois mditer.
Je ne vais pas vous aider parce que vous le demandez.
Je me fiche de faire quelque chose ou non...
Nous avons plus besoin de prier que de combattre.
Je ne sais pas quoi faire ici...
Je n'ai plus de tours dans mon orbe !
Je savais que c'tait du toc...
Une statue ne doit rien faire.
Il vaudrait mieux que j'agisse vite.
Je vais t'attaquer jusqu' ce que tu rpondes !
Je n'ai besoin de personne pour me dire quoi faire !
Moi seul peut nous mener la victoire.
J'ai bien peu d'espoirs pour que cela fonctionne.
Je veux que cette peur s'arrte.
Il doit bien y avoir un moyen d'arrter ces tremblements.
D'o tiens-tu cette chose dans tes mains ?
Je les entends tourner autour de nous.
Pourquoi ne pas reprendre de suite ? je veux me battre encore.
Je veux encore me battre, je veux saigner !
Laissons-les venir, un combat ne peut que me faire plus mal.
Il va falloir tre plus solides que cela.
Je suis venu avec vous ; j'ai eu tort.
Je ne devrais mme pas tre avec vous.
N'oubliez pas de me remercier, moi et ma magie.
J'aurais du partir seul, je suis forc de tout partager avec vous.
Je suis ce pourquoi tout le monde est encore en vie maintenant.
Tais-toi donc ! Je me concentre sur mon tour de magie.
Je me fiche de tes commentaires, je suis sur autre chose.
Attention, je suis mage et tu ne sais rien !
Je dois me dbarrasser de cette maldiction.
Le mysticisme est un art qui laisse ouvert toute rponse.
Attendez que j'aie accumul assez de magie !
C'tait donc pour a qu'il connaissaient nos mouvements.
Tu m'as fait rater mon coup du manteau !
Je t'ai vu ! Tu as touch mon orbe !
Allez je vais vous rendre la tche plus simple !
Faites donc le reste de ce que je me fais !
Mieux vaut tout arrter ici et maintenant.
Sans mes pouvoirs et avec cette peau, autant mourir.
J'y suis peut-tre all un peu loin avec ce coup-l.
Comment ai-je pu rater ce tour-l ?
Quel intrt ? Ils nous attendent derrire !
Ils sont bien plus nombreux autre part qu'ici, il faut rester.
Courir sans fin n'arrtera pas ma maldiction.
C'est ici que tout s'arrte. Pas autre part
Non ! Comment vais-je pouvoir ressentir la douleur si on fuit ?
Nous ne sommes pas des peureux!
Ils ont pourtant l'air d'apprcier ce que je fais...
Ils n'ont pas vu assez de mes tours !
S'ils m'ont touch, c'est qu'ils savaient o j'allais.
Je mets a sur le compte de la peur.
Il savait presque ce que j'allais faire ?!
Quelqu'un lui a dit ce que j'allais fire !
Tu peux le faire, essaie encore !
Eloigne ton arme et toi de moi !
Hors de mon chemin si tu ne veux pas subir le mme sort.
Qui va me regarder s'ils meurent ?
Il n'y a plus d'espoir pour nous...
C'est ce que tu voulais, n'est-ce pas ?
N'y a t-il donc que moi pour les toucher ?
Je vais devoir te licencier si tu continues ainsi.
Pourquoi rester pour combattre ? Le risque est trop grand.
Je sais qu'il prparent quelque chose.
C'est de ta faute si nous perdons ce combat !
Rien ne change... pour le moment.
Cela ne fait que repousser l'invitable.
Pourquoi t'a t'il rat ? Je ne serais pas surpris qu'il recommence.
Il faudrait que l'on aille de l'autre ct.
Nous allons tre attaqus si nous faisons cela.
Non, la douleur est mieux ressentie ici !
Tu ne sais pas o aller, n'est-ce pas ?
Ce n'est pas idal pour mon spectacle
Cela ne ferait que me fatiguer.
Non, je ne te fais pas confiance.
Je prfre la douleur, a ira.
La maldiction attnue dja trop ma douleur.
Je ne prfre pas, le rsultat sera le mme...
Je n'ai pas besoin de cet outil !
Qui a dit que je voulais de l'aide ?
Je ne veux pas de ton traitement de faveur.
A qui cela profite t-il de me soigner ?
Je n'en ai pas besoin maintenant !
Je ne peux pas me reposer de suite.
Je le ferais quand je veux, moi-mme.
Mes pouvoirs sont suffisants, pour le moment!
Mon corps me crie de combattre de suite !
Cela ne va changer quoi que ce soit.
Je ne suis pas sur que cela aide.
Ma magie devrait me maintenir debout !
Il ne faudrait pas camper ici.
La peur est une fascinante motion.
Ce bruit ne me dit rien qui vaille.
Plus de combats, plus de douleur !
Je savais que c'tait une mauvaise ide.
Laissez-moi un instant avant de reprendre le spectacle.
Je suis sur qu'ils prparent quelque chose.
Je n'aime pas votre manire de me regarder.
Comme si cela allait faire une diffrence.
Heureusement que beaucoup de monde nous rend visite.
Il est si dur de faire des tours de magie...
Si seulement je pouvais gouter la nourriture.
Cette nourriture a un got bizarre !
Je n'ai pas besoin de tant de nourriture.
Une victoire en combat ne sera pas due la nourriture.
Cette cause est une cause perdue
Je suis trop occup pour manger maintenant
Alright, i guess i will eat.

Enigma wears aetheric robes and carries a mysterious orb of arcane power, ever since a curse turned his skin to stone his power has grown exponentially. He empowers his abilities and his allies, the longer the fight lasts the stronger the group becomes.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.

Riddles and puzzles are not the only things the Enigma excels at. Using his power, he can increase the group's offensive or defensive capability. His abilities are very versatile, he can empower them in different ways.

Enigma is a patient individual. He stays awake as others rest, he gives his group riddles and puzzles to occupy their minds and relieve their stress. His most iconic thing is creating framents that everyone can use to empower themselves or trinkets that empower him immensely.
I will do what i must.
Create a fragment of power or a trinket for this class.
This should help close your wounds.
Here, I don't need these, I hardly ever bleed.
I don't need these, here you go.
As long as I'm here you will have unimaginable power.
You shouldn't be afraid as long as I'm here.
I'm pretty sure this will all end well.
There is no room for failure! I will protect us!
Look at us, we are unstoppable!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
That is something i'm not interested in.
I think i need to meditate instead.
I should have stayed at the Hamlet!
I despise this feeling of fear.
I feel the presence of our enemies.
More of them will be here soon.
We have to hurry, more are coming.
You can do better than that!
Coming here with you was a mistake.
We are not going to survive this.
I will forever be in your debt.
I will take you all on!
Need to move back, the tension is overwhelming.
They are coming, I have to move.
I will give you some time to recover.
I will buy you some time.
Standing here doesn't do us any good.
No, I wont just stand here.
Why does this fear last so long?
If I do that, they will kill me.
They want me to do that!
I am not sure if now is the time.
That cannot be done at the moment.
I don't care about any of this.
There is no need for that.
I am exhausted, i need a moment.
Arcane arts are not easy, give me some time.
I'm pretty sure this is a better idea.
I know what has to be done!
I have waited a long time for this.
I will win this battle for us.
Arcane arts are hard to execute.
I know what spell must be used.
This is better for the current situation.
I am not sure what to do.
I have to do something to stop this fear.
Be very careful, they are near.
We need to hurry this up, i thirsty for a fight.
I'm itching to cast more spells.
You all need to become more resilient.
Coming with you was a bad idea.
I shouldn't be here with all of you.
Without my sorcery, you would perish.
I think i should have lead my own expedition.
I am the reason why we still stand.
I wish we got another curse.
I think it's time to return to the Hamlet.
I don't care what you have to say.
Watch what you say in front of a mystic!
I'm over here, come and get me!
Let's see if you can hurt me!
My arcane arts will end you!
I'm so tired, cannot go further.
What is the meaning of this?
Why leave? They are waiting for us!
More are waiting outside, we shouldn't retreat.
This needs to be our end!
This is where our path ends.
No, we need to stay and fight!
We are no cowards, fight on!
They knew what i was going to do?!
That cannot happen and somehow it did...
Get out of my way, i need some room.
This will almost certainly end badly...
There is no hope for us.
This is what you wanted, isn't it?
I knew that was going to happen...
How do you let that happen?
It's not smart to stay and fight, if we know the risk is high.
I know that they are up to something.
We are failing because of you!
I refuse to believe that just happened.
This is a very suspicious situation.
Can someone remind me why we are making the same mistakes twice.
We should move the other way.
We are about to be attacked.
You have no idea where we are going, don't you?
Why are we going this way again?
I am so tired of this journey.
No, i am not using that.
That is exactly what they want.
That will not make a difference.
Rather not, the outcome will still be the same.
I don't need help to survive.
That is not a good idea.
I do not need special care.
Healing me will not change anything.
Healing me won't help us at all.
I do not like that plan.
I will heal, when i want to heal.
I don't need empowerment right now!
This isn't the time, they are surrounding us!
My gut tells me i should fight!
That will not change the outcome!
That will not make a difference.
No, I know what I'm doing, leave me be.
No, I will not do that.
You are no match for me!
This is not a good place to rest.
Fear is such a fascinating emotion.
That sound cannot be a good sign.
We need to hurry up, our next battle awaits.
I knew coming here was a bad idea.
Today is a very sad day.
I need some time to recover.
I'm having a hard time focusing.
I feel we should abandon this quest.
I know for a fact they are planning something.
I don't like how you are all looking at me.
I should have stayed in the inn.
Can i have some silence, please.
Like that will make a difference.
I like your enthusiasm, but that doesn't change a thing.
We live because of my esoteric sorcery.
I am always the reason groups survive.
I wish i could taste food.
I don't need that much food.
I would rather pass on food.
We need to get this over with quickly.
Being fed won't help us win battles.
This does not help us one bit.
We are all here for a lost cause.
I don't think i should eat right now.
Alright, i guess i will eat.

You are no match for me!
This is not a good place to rest.
Fear is such a fascinating emotion.
That sound cannot be a good sign.
We need to hurry up, our next battle awaits.
I knew coming here was a bad idea.
Today is a very sad day.
I need some time to recover.
I'm having a hard time focusing.
I feel we should abandon this quest.
I know for a fact they are planning something.
I don't like how you are all looking at me.
I should have stayed in the inn.
Can i have some silence, please.
Like that will make a difference.
I like your enthusiasm, but that doesn't change a thing.
We live because of my esoteric sorcery.
I am always the reason groups survive.
I wish i could taste food.
I don't need that much food.
I would rather pass on food.
We need to get this over with quickly.
Being fed won't help us win battles.
This does not help us one bit.
We are all here for a lost cause.
I don't think i should eat right now.
Alright, i guess i will eat.

Enigma wears aetheric robes and carries a mysterious orb of arcane power, ever since a curse turned his skin to stone his power has grown exponentially. He empowers his abilities and his allies, the longer the fight lasts the stronger the group becomes.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.

Riddles and puzzles are not the only things the Enigma excels at. Using his power, he can increase the group's offensive or defensive capability. His abilities are very versatile, he can empower them in different ways.

Enigma is a patient individual. He stays awake as others rest, he gives his group riddles and puzzles to occupy their minds and relieve their stress. His most iconic thing is creating framents that everyone can use to empower themselves or trinkets that empower him immensely.
I will do what i must.
Create a fragment of power or a trinket for this class.
This should help close your wounds.
Here, I don't need these, I hardly ever bleed.
I don't need these, here you go.
As long as I'm here you will have unimaginable power.
You shouldn't be afraid as long as I'm here.
I'm pretty sure this will all end well.
There is no room for failure! I will protect us!
Look at us, we are unstoppable!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
That is something i'm not interested in.
I think i need to meditate instead.
I should have stayed at the Hamlet!
I despise this feeling of fear.
I feel the presence of our enemies.
More of them will be here soon.
We have to hurry, more are coming.
You can do better than that!
Coming here with you was a mistake.
We are not going to survive this.
I will forever be in your debt.
I will take you all on!
Need to move back, the tension is overwhelming.
They are coming, I have to move.
I will give you some time to recover.
I will buy you some time.
Standing here doesn't do us any good.
No, I wont just stand here.
Why does this fear last so long?
If I do that, they will kill me.
They want me to do that!
I am not sure if now is the time.
That cannot be done at the moment.
I don't care about any of this.
There is no need for that.
I am exhausted, i need a moment.
Arcane arts are not easy, give me some time.
I'm pretty sure this is a better idea.
I know what has to be done!
I have waited a long time for this.
I will win this battle for us.
Arcane arts are hard to execute.
I know what spell must be used.
This is better for the current situation.
I am not sure what to do.
I have to do something to stop this fear.
Be very careful, they are near.
We need to hurry this up, i thirsty for a fight.
I'm itching to cast more spells.
You all need to become more resilient.
Coming with you was a bad idea.
I shouldn't be here with all of you.
Without my sorcery, you would perish.
I think i should have lead my own expedition.
I am the reason why we still stand.
I wish we got another curse.
I think it's time to return to the Hamlet.
I don't care what you have to say.
Watch what you say in front of a mystic!
I'm over here, come and get me!
Let's see if you can hurt me!
My arcane arts will end you!
I'm so tired, cannot go further.
What is the meaning of this?
Why leave? They are waiting for us!
More are waiting outside, we shouldn't retreat.
This needs to be our end!
This is where our path ends.
No, we need to stay and fight!
We are no cowards, fight on!
They knew what i was going to do?!
That cannot happen and somehow it did...
Get out of my way, i need some room.
This will almost certainly end badly...
There is no hope for us.
This is what you wanted, isn't it?
I knew that was going to happen...
How do you let that happen?
It's not smart to stay and fight, if we know the risk is high.
I know that they are up to something.
We are failing because of you!
I refuse to believe that just happened.
This is a very suspicious situation.
Can someone remind me why we are making the same mistakes twice.
We should move the other way.
We are about to be attacked.
You have no idea where we are going, don't you?
Why are we going this way again?
I am so tired of this journey.
No, i am not using that.
That is exactly what they want.
That will not make a difference.
Rather not, the outcome will still be the same.
I don't need help to survive.
That is not a good idea.
I do not need special care.
Healing me will not change anything.
Healing me won't help us at all.
I do not like that plan.
I will heal, when i want to heal.
I don't need empowerment right now!
This isn't the time, they are surrounding us!
My gut tells me i should fight!
That will not change the outcome!
That will not make a difference.
No, I know what I'm doing, leave me be.
No, I will not do that.
You are no match for me!
This is not a good place to rest.
Fear is such a fascinating emotion.
That sound cannot be a good sign.
We need to hurry up, our next battle awaits.
I knew coming here was a bad idea.
Today is a very sad day.

I'm having a hard time focusing.
I feel we should abandon this quest.

I don't like how you are all looking at me.

Can i have some silence, please.
Like that will make a difference.
I like your enthusiasm, but that doesn't change a thing.
We live because of my esoteric sorcery.
I am always the reason groups survive.
I wish i could taste food.
I don't need that much food.
I would rather pass on food.
We need to get this over with quickly.
Being fed won't help us win battles.
This does not help us one bit.
We are all here for a lost cause.
I don't think i should eat right now.

Arkanista nosi eteryczne szaty i dziery tajemn kul, a gdy przez kltw jego skra zmienia si w kamie, jego moc gwatownie wzrosa. Wzmacnia siebie i kompanw, przez co grupa staje si potniejsza wraz z upywem czasu.
Nie jest bezpiecznym trzymanie nas blisko siebie.
Sensu nie ma jego obecno tutaj.
Zagadki nie s jedyn rzecz, w ktrej Arkanista si specjalizuje. Uywajc swych mocy moe zwikszy defensyw i ofensyw druyny. Jego umiejtnoci s bardzo wszechstronne, a ponadto wzmacniaj si nawzajem.

Arkanista jest indywidualist. Zawsze czuwa, gdy inni pi, daje druynie zagadki do rozwizanie w celu uspokojenia ich i ukojenia stresu. Jego ikoniczn umiejtnoci jest tworzenie odamkw, ktre mog posuy do wzmocnienia kompanw lub byskotek.
Stwrz odamek mocy lub blyskotk dla tej klasy.
Prosz, we to. Ja nigdy nie krwawi
Przyjmij to, ja ich nie potrzebuj.
Tak dugo jak tu jestem macie niesamowit moc.
Nie musisz si ba tak dugo, jak ja tu jestem.
Dobre zakoczenie jest ze mn rzecz pewn.
Tu nie ma miejsca na pomyki. Ja nas obroni!
Nigdy nie wtpcie w moj magi!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
Wicej z nich si tu pojawi.
Przyjcie tu z wami byo pomyk.
Musz si wycofa, to napicie mnie przy.
Dam wam troch czasu na odnow.
Stanie tutaj nic nam nie da
Nie jestem w stanie si ruszy.
Czemu ten strach tak mnie mczy?
Nie jestem pewien, czy czas teraz na to.
Tajemne sztuki nie s proste, potrzeba mi czasu.
Jestem pewien, e to lepszy pomys.
O co tu tak naprawd chodzi?
Sztuki tajemne s cikie, nawet dla mistyka.
Wiem jakie zaklcie tu najlepiej zadziaa.
To bdzie lepsze w obecnej sytuacji.
Nie jestem pewien, co mam robi.
Musz co zrobi, by przesta si ba.
wierzbi mnie, by rzuci wicej zakl.
Przyjcie tu z wami to by zy pomys.
Nie powinienem tu z wami by.
Bez mej magii wszyscy bycie zginli.
Myl, e powinienem dowodzi swoj wasn ekspedycj.
Myl, e czas wrci do Osady.
Uwaaj, co mwisz stojc przed mistykiem!
Zobaczmy, czy dacie rad mnie zrani!
Jestem zmczony, ju nie dam rady.
Czemu odchodzimy? Oni na to czekaj!
Tam jest ich wicej, nie powinnimy std wychodzi.
Wykoczmy ich szybko i idmy dalej!
Oni wiedzieli, co ja chc zrobi?!
To nie moe si dzia, ale si dzieje...
Zejd mi z drogi, potrzebuj miejsca.
To si z pewnoci le skoczy...
Nie jest mdr dalsza walka, jeli wiemy jak wysokie jest ryzyko.
Czy moe mi kto wyjani, dlaczego popeniamy te same bdy po raz kolejny?
Nie masz pojcia gdzie idziemy, czy nie?
To jest dokadnie to, czego chce wrg.
Nie trzeba... Koniec kocw wynik bdzie ten sam...
Nie czas na to, wrg nas otacza!
To i tak le si skoczy.
To jest ze miejsce na odpoczynek.
Ten dwik nie wry nic dobrego.
Musimy si pieczy, walka na nas czeka.
Wiedziaem, e przyjcie tu to zy pomys.
Nie jestem co do tego pewien...
Czuj, e powinnimy porzuci to zadanie.
Jestem pewien, e wrogowie co planuj.
Nie podoba mi si to, jak na mnie patrzysz.
Lubi wasz entuzjazm, ale to nic nie zmieni.
To JA jestem naszym powodem do przetrwania.
Najedzenie nie pomoe nam wygra bitwy.
To nam nie pomoe, ani troch.
